system.description: Stocky, sturdy build with thick hair and beards, 3-4 feet tall. Dwarves have a temperament like rock: stoic, stubborn, and set in their ways. They tend to be gruff, but not necessarily unkind.

overview.base: When you Perceive, you see hidden doors and traps within range.
You are more inclined to gain insanities and the insanities you gain are more severe.
